text: Can you help me register an appointment at the hospital?
Of course, I can do that for you. Please provide me with the patient name, appointment date and doctor name.
The patient name is John, appointment date is 2022-03-05 and the doctor's name is Dr. Smith.
Alright, I am processing your request.
Your appointment has been successfully registered. Your appointment ID is APPT1234. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
